# RoundedBorderTextEditorStyle

**Structure**

A text editor style with a system-defined rounded border.

## Declaration

```swift
struct RoundedBorderTextEditorStyle
```

## Overview

You can also use [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TextEditorStyle/roundedBorder] to construct this style.

## Creating the text editor style

- **init()**

## Supporting types

- **AutomaticTextEditorStyle**: The default text editor style, based on the text editor’s context.
- **PlainTextEditorStyle**: A text editor style with no decoration.

## Conforms To

- TextEditorStyle
